p: One among the defense mechanisms, against infection and predation has been the chemical defenses developed by these organisms for survival. It is well-known that usage of antibiotics, fungicides, and pesticides excessively and in indiscriminate fashion has resulted in ill effects on soil health, environmental pollution, development of resistant microbes and pests [ 21, 22]. Therefore, alternatives to these compounds are needed which resulted in screening of many plants for potential biological activity [ 23, 24].
